Question: FOXX Development Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FOXX Development Inc.

Product: DreameBot X30 Ultra smart vacuum

- New add-on blade attachment to prevent tangles
- Auto-empty docking station with squeegees for self-cleaning
- ExoBrew home beer brewer
- All-in-one brewer with app control
- Withings BeamO home checkup
- Multiple sensors for at-home wellness checkup
- Govee smart lights
- Matter-enabled neon light strip with addressable zones
- Ugreen NAS
- Network-attached storage devices with Thunderbolt 4 ports and Intel processors
- Mui Board Gen 2 Matter controller
- Wooden smart controller with Matter certification
- J5create Thunderbolt 5 dock
- Dock with various ports including Thunderbolt 5 and audio output
- Xgimi IMAX 4K projector
- 4K smart projector with IMAX-enhanced picture quality
- Targus Ergo Flip Mouse
- Award-winning mouse with left-handed and right-handed use
- Hyper Magsafe, Qi2, & Thunderbolt 5
- Qi2 accessories, MagSafe SSD enclosure, and Thunderbolt 5 dock
- Invoxia Minitailz smart collar
- Smart dog collar with GPS tracking and AFib detection
- Belkin Qi2 & DockKit Auto Tracking Stand
- Qi2 battery packs and Auto-Tracking Stand Pro with DockKit support
Summary_cn:
FOXX Development Inc.

产品：DreameBot X30 Ultra 智能吸尘器

- 新增的刀片附件可防止缠绕
- 自动倒空对接站，带有橡胶刮条进行自洁
- ExoBrew 家用啤酒酿造机
- 一体化酿造设备，带有应用程序控制
- Withings BeamO 家庭体检仪
- 多个传感器用于家庭健康检查
- Govee 智能灯
- 带有可编址区域的 Matter 支持的霓虹灯带
- Ugreen NAS
- 带有 Thunderbolt 4 端口和英特尔处理器的网络附加存储设备
- Mui Board 第二代 Matter 控制器
- 木质智能控制器，具有 Matter 认证
- J5create Thunderbolt 5 站
- 带有各种接口，包括 Thunderbolt 5 和音频输出的站
- Xgimi IMAX 4K 投影仪
- IMAX 强化画质的 4K 智能投影仪
- Targus Ergo Flip 鼠标
- 获奖无线鼠标，可左右手使用
- Hyper Magsafe、Qi2 和 Thunderbolt 5
- Qi2 配件，MagSafe SSD 外壳和 Thunderbolt 5 站
- Invoxia Minitailz 智能项圈
- 智能狗项圈，带有 GPS 定位和心房颤动检测
- Belkin Qi2 和 DockKit 自动跟踪支架
- Qi2 电池组和带有 DockKit 支持的自动跟踪支架专业版
